artists.name: Riccardo Muti
artists.bio: Riccardo Muti is an Italian conductor, currently serving as the music director of the Chicago Symphony Orchestra.

artists.name: Yuja Wang
artists.bio: Yuja Wang is a Chinese classical pianist known for her charismatic stage presence and virtuosic skill.

artists.name: Chicago Symphony Orchestra
artists.bio: The Chicago Symphony Orchestra is one of the leading orchestras in the world, known for its powerful performances and rich history.

artists.name: John Adams
artists.bio: John Adams is an American composer known for his innovative and contemporary compositions.

program.notes: Harmonielehre is a symphonic work by John Adams, inspired by a dream and the music of Mahler and Sibelius.
Rachmaninoff's Piano Concerto No. 2 is one of the most popular piano concertos, known for its lush melodies and emotional depth.
Brahms' Symphony No. 4 is a masterpiece of the symphonic repertoire, known for its complexity and emotional depth.
